title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: Prehistoric camel art pointed to precious water sources in the Arabian Desert
items.description: Hunter-gatherers may have used the engravings to find water 12,000 years ago

items.title: Canada’s Supreme Court will decide fate of ostrich flock hit by bird flu
items.description: Farmers and supporters—including RFK Jr. and Dr. Oz—urge government to spare birds that survived H5N1 outbreak

items.title: Mysterious will-o’-the-wisps ignited by microlightning
items.description: Electrical discharge from microscopic bubbles offers a new explanation for fleeting flames of folklore

items.title: How AIs responded to the 2024 U.S. presidential election—in real time
items.description: First-of-its-kind study captures how AI models’ behavior evolved through the campaign season

items.title: Paleolithic painters had the blues
items.description: Two recent studies shine light on the earliest known artistic usages of blue pigment

items.title: ‘Completely shattered.’ Changes to NSF’s graduate student fellowship spur outcry
items.description: The announcement comes months later than usual, leaving many would-be applicants stranded

items.title: Ecuadorian scientists cleared of criminal charges in COVID-19 testing case
items.description: Prosecutors alleged officials and researchers defrauded government during the early months of the pandemic

items.title: Researchers are relieved at Trump’s likely pick for National Cancer Institute
items.description: Harvard physician-scientist Anthony Letai is poised to head world’s largest cancer research agency

items.title: How fungus-farming termites control weeds
items.description: Termites enlist microbes to defend their crops from undesirable fungi

items.title: In a first, a gene therapy seems to slow Huntington disease
items.description: Small study suggests uniQure drug could be first successful treatment for devastating brain disorder
